titles.title: In The Mighty Name Of Jesus (hymn of the churc

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mighty Name! Mighty Name! In that Name alone we win. Mighty Name! Mighty Name! Conquering Satan, death and sin.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the Mighty Name of Jesus, When we bow before the Throne, Many deadly foes are vanquished, Many victories are won,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we plead the Name of Jesus, Satan and his hosts must flee Jesus! Jesus! Precious Jesus! In Thy Name is victory{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Soon shall come the blessed moment When the battle shall be won When the Mighty name of Jesus Shall exalt us to the Throne{/lang-eng}
